alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Kingfisher; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 8:59AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kingfisher, northeastern Blaine, southwestern Garfield and southeastern Major Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 859 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Ames to 6 miles east of Longdale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enid, Waukomis, Okeene, Lahoma, Ringwood, Drummond, Breckenridge, Ames, Meno, Vance Air Force Base, Isabella, North Enid, Homestead, Southard, and Lacey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
